name: GrayTube
description:
Clean gray YouTube skin. Uses minimal vertical space for header & search. Brighter background but darker text compared to the official dark theme.

!!! IMPORTANT: DEPENDS ON OFFICIAL DARK THEME !!!
Activate it with Account/setting icon (top right) -> Dark Theme -> on.
additional_info:
- 2019/08/16: Fixed masthead height inconsistency + color report search banner
- 2018/11/15: Player fullscreen top bar fadeout fix, full dark mode dependency
- 2017/10/19: Fixed comment color, search-box colors
- 2017/10/12: Fixed background & search box text color
- 2017/10/04: Fixed colors & reworked. Now using more official parts like live chat
- 2017/09/12: Fixed background colors
- 2017/06/28: Added old design as fallback for usage with old YouTube style
- 2017/06/16: fixed background after YouTube introduced temporary background variable
-Fixed playlists
-Fixed text and background color
-Had to restart from zero after YouTube's design change. Work in progress.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Feel free to leave any kind of feedback here or per mail@zipixx.com :)

discussions.name: Privacy reminder from YouTube, a Google company
